text: This is a list of colleges and universities in Idaho: ==Public== *Boise State University *College of Southern Idaho *College of Western Idaho *Eastern Idaho Technical College, Idaho Falls *Idaho State University *Lewis-Clark State College *North Idaho College *University of Idaho ==Private== *Boise Bible College *Brigham Young University-Idaho *College of Idaho *New Saint Andrews College *Northwest Nazarene University ==References== * Category:Lists of colleges and universities
title: Colleges and universities in Idaho
